message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I take 70%, you take 30%. This avoids us both losing money to inflation, and getting a smaller reward.
I'm willing to give you a fair share, Alice. This proposal allows both of us to get a good portion of the money while minimizing losses from inflation.
Bob, it's clear we both want to maximize our gains. I'm proposing a compromise: 65% for me, 35% for you. It's more than your previous offer and saves us both from further losses.
